title: Introducing: Cailin Russo
body:
LA’s **Cailin Russo** is already a household name to some, having made her name both through modelling and starring in two music videos from the one and only Bieber; her enviably social media following have eagerly been awaiting the release of her own musical endeavours.

Her debut single, _September Rose_, is a real signal of intent – bluesy pop that manages to carve out a truly unique vibe of its own. With more tracks expected later this year, this is a debut that’s likely to leave a serious impression. Check it out below.
